title: Madhur Jaffrey’s Undefinable Roles
description: The chef, author and actress, whose children’s book, “Seasons of Splendour,” was reissued this month, refuses to be boxed in.
dc:creator: Thessaly La Force
media:credit: Adrianna Newell for The New York Times
media:description: Madhur Jaffrey, shown here at her home in Hillsdale, New York, continues to publish recipes and articles, appear on podcasts, give interviews and speak in documentaries — even rapping in a music video with the artist Mr. Cardamom.
